DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether combine radiofrequency ablation ( RFA ) cytokine-induced killer cell ( CIK ) transfusion prolong survival patient ovarian carcinoma .
DOC.brief_title: Radiofrquency Ablation Combined With Cytokine-induced Killer Cells Patients With Ovarian Carcinoma
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective evaluate whether RFA follow CIK transfusion prolong survival patient ovarian carcinoma .
DOC.criteria: 1. patient diagnosed FIGO stage II ovarian carcinoma ; 2. cytoreductive surgery perform 6 course platinumbased chemotherapy complete ; 3. medical record maintain comprehensive data treatment followup ; 4. history previous malignancy . 1. neoadjuvant chemotherapy apply ; 2. less 6 course chemotherapy 6 course chemotherapy complete ; 3. medical record maintain incomplete data treatment followup ; 4. history previous malignancy .
